jpacman.model
Class PlayerMove

java.lang.Object
  jpacman.model.Move
      jpacman.model.PlayerMove

public class PlayerMove
extends Move

Class to represent the effects of moving the player.

Version:
$Id: PlayerMove.java,v 1.6 2008/02/11 13:05:20 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Aug 18, 2003

invariant

public boolean invariant()
Verify that the food eaten remains non negative, the player/mover equal and non-null.

Returns:
true iff the invariant holds.

Attempt to move the player towards a target guest.
